p: Lamiaceae, Asteraceae, and Rutaceae are among the main families investigated for their anti-mosquito properties. Given this, in the present research, the EOs, extracted from Artemisia verlotiorum Lamotte (Asteraceae), Lavandula dentata L. (Lamiaceae), and Ruta chalepensis L. (Rutaceae), were evaluated for their efficacy as repellents, larvicides, and oviposition deterrents against Ae. albopictus together with their impact on human sensorial system.
